name: Jimmy's Super League
description:
Here's your chance to manage a football team and play against the best teams in Europe in a league format. After selecting your team you are now sitting in your office in a 1st person perspective. Various parts of the office allow you to pick your team, buy and sell players, scout players, get a loan and look at your league position. The week number and how much money you have are shown.

Once you're happy with your selections you can then move onto the next game. At the top of the screen a side view of one half of the pitch is shown. Below the pitch is a description of the action. When a goal mouth action appears you will see a player and a goalkeeper. The player shoots and a save or goal is shown. The two teams, score and game time are displayed at the bottom of the screen

shot.caption: Information of one of your players...evening Dave
You can phone the bank manager for a loan, or just hang up and tell him it was a wrong number
The transfer market, here we are looking at Branco, Hamburg's forward, but he costs far too much money...ah well, we'll phone anyway to say hello and see if he'll come round for mother's dinner
However, Hamburg's manager has picked up the phone instead...hang on haven't I seen you from somewhere before?
The scout findings of your opponents compared to you...our attack rating of 4 is a cause for concern
Throughout the match a commentator keeps you up to date on the action as it happens
Oooh that was a golden chance that slipped by...even the commentator can't believe it!
Full time and it's a typical boring goalless draw, what a complete waste of time and money!
The other results brought to you by Jim Results Service
This was the attendance of the last match
Oh brilliant!  Just the very thing I needed...bah!  And I swear you look very familiar...
